aboutMe.name: Mochy Nguyen
aboutMe.bio: Hello! I'm Mochy Nguyen, a passionate and self-motivated software engineer based in Vancouver. While I may not hold a traditional university degree, my journey in technology is marked by a commitment to continuous learning and a love for hands-on experience.
aboutMe.aspiration: Looking ahead, I am excited about contributing to innovative projects and exploring new horizons in software development. My commitment to agile methodologies, continuous integration, and a strong focus on product development align with my vision for shaping the future of technology. Join me on this exciting journey where learning, creativity, and a passion for technology converge!
